titles.title: Flat Tax Rate Act
To make an Income Tax that is a flat 15 percent for all American citizens.
Flat Tax Rate Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Flat Tax Rate Act - Imposes a federal income tax rate of 15% on all income of all U.S. citizens, regardless of annual income or current economic standing. Allows exemptions for single and joint tax return filers and for each child of a taxpayer up to the age of 18.
